short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start studying with Procrastostudy! Locks out websites that may distract your attention.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* Procrastostudy is a browser extension that blocks websites from impulsive decisions to distract yourself from study.

*Students can turn this extension on and off at will. 

* If there are any further websites you want blocked, you can contact me with a website you want blocked and ill add it to the blacklist.

*To turn on and off this extension, you must go into chrome://extensions/ and manually turn the extension on and off. You can also choose which websites you want blocked in the 'details' page underneath Procrastostudy.
